body: I am not sure. Which mod, version do you mean? After crash there is no debug/exception file in \Documents\OpenRA\Logs (on Win)?

How did you install the aftermath assets?  Using the downloader, a physical disc, or an iso?  The aftermath iso hosted on cncnz.com is corrupted, and installing assets using this source is known to cause issues like this.

Well for the "mod version" I'm using the latest build of OpenRA, and I've used my old CD-rom copy of Aftermath for the files. I have ran the aftermath expansion CD on a older system and the shock trooper works fine. But I did look into the last log just after checking here to see what the solution might be and I think I found the problem in the last log. (The site won't let me attach the text file for some reason, here is the raw bit. I will bold the issue I found.)
_______________________________________________________
Red Alert Mod at Version release-20170421
on map 58da5c480d13a00a07c9bee00f928f70564f188f (Nine Lives by PizzaAtomica).
Date: 2017-05-30 01:55:14Z
Operating System: Windows (Microsoft Windows NT 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1)
Runtime Version: .NET CLR 4.0.30319.42000
**## Exception of type `System.IO.InvalidDataException`: jjump1.aud is not a valid sound file!**
   at OpenRA.Sound.LoadSound(ISoundLoader[] loaders, IReadOnlyFileSystem fileSystem, String filename)
   at OpenRA.Sound.<Initialize>c__AnonStorey0.<>m__0(String s)
   at OpenRA.Exts.GetOrAdd[K,V](Dictionary`2 d, K k, Func`2 createFn)
   at OpenRA.Primitives.Cache`2.get_Item(T key)
   at OpenRA.Sound.PlayPredefined(SoundType soundType, Ruleset ruleset, Player p, Actor voicedActor, String type, String definition, String variant, Boolean relative, WPos pos, Single volumeModifier, Boolean attenuateVolume)
   at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Traits.Voiced.PlayVoice(Actor self, String phrase, String variant)
   at OpenRA.VoiceExts.PlayVoice(Actor self, String phrase)
   at OpenRA.Selection.Combine(World world, IEnumerable`1 newSelection, Boolean isCombine, Boolean isClick)
   at OpenRA.Mods.Common.Widgets.WorldInteractionControllerWidget.HandleMouseInput(MouseInput mi)
   at OpenRA.Widgets.Widget.HandleMouseInputOuter(MouseInput mi)
   at OpenRA.Widgets.Ui.HandleInput(MouseInput mi)
   at OpenRA.DefaultInputHandler.<OnMouseInput>c__AnonStorey2.<>m__0()
   at OpenRA.Sync.CheckSyncUnchanged[T](World world, Func`1 fn)
   at OpenRA.DefaultInputHandler.OnMouseInput(MouseInput input)
   at OpenRA.Platforms.Default.Sdl2Input.PumpInput(Sdl2GraphicsDevice device, IInputHandler inputHandler)
   at OpenRA.Platforms.Default.Sdl2GraphicsDevice.PumpInput(IInputHandler inputHandler)
   at OpenRA.Renderer.EndFrame(IInputHandler inputHandler)
   at OpenRA.Game.RenderTick()
   at OpenRA.Game.Loop()
   at OpenRA.Game.Run()
   at OpenRA.Program.Run(String[] args)
